title: Fixture-based smoke run generates a valid, non-placeholder bundle
scope: Add a fixture-backed smoke run that exercises the INT-030 detection/MOT/team pipeline path.
Ensure the generated bundle validates via the existing CLI validate command.
Keep smoke run deterministic and suitable for CI/guardrails.
acceptance: A smoke test runs the fixture-based pipeline and produces a bundle that passes `fusbal-pipeline validate`.
The smoke test asserts at least one player record is emitted and that break/team semantics appear in at least one record when the fixture is designed to produce them.
The smoke test is deterministic (no timestamps/randomness in outputs beyond allowed fields).

deliverables.title: Fixture-based smoke test
acceptance: Smoke test runs and validates the resulting bundle.
evidence: CI/pytest executes the smoke test reliably.

subtasks.title: Add a smoke test that runs the new CLI run command and validates the bundle.
done_when: Smoke test runs fixture, then calls validate, and asserts ok.
